resources.string: Get the lastest update of the City of Montréal\'s data
Google Play Service must be installed to show map
No infractions found for that establishment!
City data is not available, try again later

This product contains open data granted under license to use by the Government Administration available at www.données.gouv.qc.ca. The granting of a license does not constitute an endorsement of the product by the Government Administration.

Restonet QC is your tool for visualizing the official inspection data of the Ministère de l\'Agriculture, des Pêcheries et de l\'Alimentation du Québec (MAPAQ) which publishes a list of food establishments convicted for breaches of the regulations on food products (excluding institutions located in the territory of the city of Montreal) on health protection of animals and the minimum processing of marine products.
Android application created by Jean Bagdoo in 2013
Geocoder failed to update map, restart device and try again
